mapper.select: select l9.TYPENAME,L9.CDRY_CDMA_TARGET,L9.CDRY_BB_TARGET,L9.CDRY_GT_TARGET,L9.CDRY_ZD_TARGET, nvl(l8.bbNew,0) bbNew,nvl(l8.cdmaNew,0)cdmaNew,nvl(l8.gtNew,0)gtNew,nvl(l8.itvNew,0)itvNew,nvl(l8.rhNew,0)rhNew,nvl(l8.zdNew,0)zdNew from ( select * from (select Zj_Name,ZJ_PROPERTY,nvl(cdmaNew,0)cdmaNew,nvl(bbNew,0)bbNew,nvl(rhNew,0)rhNew,nvl(gtNew,0)gtNew,nvl(itvNew,0)itvNew,nvl(zdNew,0)zdNew from (select p2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME as Zj_Name,p2.ZJ_PROPERTY,nvl(p1.cdmaNew,0) as cdmaNew,nvl(p1.bbNew,0) as bbNew,nvl(p1.rhNew,0) as rhNew,nvl(p1.gtNew,0) as gtNew,nvl(p1.itvNew,0) as itvNew from (select B.ZJ,SUM(MSU_NEW_CDMA_CNT)AS cdmaNew,SUM(MSU_NEW_LAN_CNT)AS bbNew,SUM(MSU_MIX_CNT)AS rhNew,SUM(MSU_MIX_169_CNT)AS gtNew,SUM(MSU_NEW_ITV_CNT)AS itvNew from XFY_RPT_IO_DAY a1 left join XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY B ON A1.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=B.MKT_NAME WHERE A1.APPLY_DT>= #{startDate} AND A1.APPLY_DT<= #{endDate} group by B.ZJ )p1 right join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_PAR p2 on p1.ZJ=p2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME) l1 left join ( select B.ZJ,nvl(count(*),0) AS zdNew from XFY_RPT_PROM_LST_IO_DAY_D a2 left join XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY B ON A2.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=B.MKT_NAME WHERE a2.APPLY_DT>= #{startDate} AND a2.APPLY_DT<= #{endDate} and a2.OFFER_NAME in ( '202010话费权益40元/月（24月）','202012话费权益50元/月（24月）','202002套餐减免30元/月（24月）','202003副卡终端购机包19元/月（24月）', '202003副卡终端购机包29元/月（24月）','202106零首付1200元分期月付50元（24月）' ) group by B.ZJ ) l2 on l1.Zj_Name=l2.ZJ where l1.Zj_Name <> '鄞州政企部' order by decode(l1.Zj_Name,'鄞州潘火公众支局',0,'鄞州潘火政企支局',1,'鄞州钟公庙综合支局',2,'鄞州长丰综合支局',3,'鄞州新城综合支局',4,'鄞州首南综合支局',5,'鄞州南商政企支局',6, '鄞州东郊综合支局',7,'鄞州下应综合支局',8,'鄞州中河城东综合支局',9,'鄞州东柳综合支局',10,'鄞州福明综合支局',11,'鄞州中河城西综合支局',12,'鄞州明楼综合支局',13,'鄞州白鹤综合支局',14, '鄞州东胜综合支局',15,'鄞州百丈综合支局',16,'鄞州姜山综合支局',17,'鄞州东钱湖综合支局',18,'鄞州邱隘综合支局',19,'鄞州五乡综合支局',20,'鄞州云龙综合支局',21,'鄞州横溪综合支局',22, '鄞州塘溪综合支局',23,'鄞州瞻岐综合支局',24,'鄞州东吴综合支局',25,'鄞州咸祥综合支局',26)) union all select l3.ZJ Zj_Name,ZJ_PROPERTY,nvl(l3.cdmaNew,0)cdmaNew,nvl(l3.bbNew,0)bbNew,nvl(l3.rhNew,0)rhNew,nvl(gtNew,0)gtNew,nvl(l3.itvNew,0)itvNew,nvl(l4.zdNew,0)zdNew from(select '合计' as ZJ,'-' as ZJ_PROPERTY,SUM(MSU_NEW_CDMA_CNT)AS cdmaNew,SUM(MSU_NEW_LAN_CNT)AS bbNew,SUM(MSU_MIX_CNT)AS rhNew,SUM(MSU_MIX_169_CNT)AS gtNew,SUM(MSU_NEW_ITV_CNT)AS itvNew from XFY_RPT_IO_DAY a1 WHERE A1.APPLY_DT>= #{startDate} AND A1.APPLY_DT<= #{endDate} l3 left join ( select '合计' as ZJ,nvl(count(*),0) AS zdNew from XFY_RPT_PROM_LST_IO_DAY_D a2 WHERE a2.APPLY_DT>= #{startDate} AND a2.APPLY_DT<= #{endDate} and a2.OFFER_NAME in ( '202010话费权益40元/月（24月）','202012话费权益50元/月（24月）','202002套餐减免30元/月（24月）','202003副卡终端购机包19元/月（24月）', '202003副卡终端购机包29元/月（24月）','202106零首付1200元分期月付50元（24月）' ) )l4 on l3.ZJ=l4.ZJ ) l8 right join XFY_REP_ZSS_TARGET L9 ON L8.Zj_Name=L9.TYPENAME where l9.TYPENAME in ('鄞州潘火公众支局','鄞州潘火政企支局','鄞州钟公庙综合支局','鄞州长丰综合支局','鄞州新城综合支局','鄞州首南综合支局','鄞州南商政企支局', '鄞州东郊综合支局','鄞州下应综合支局','鄞州中河城东综合支局','鄞州东柳综合支局','鄞州福明综合支局','鄞州中河城西综合支局','鄞州明楼综合支局','鄞州白鹤综合支局', '鄞州东胜综合支局','鄞州百丈综合支局','鄞州姜山综合支局','鄞州东钱湖综合支局','鄞州邱隘综合支局','鄞州五乡综合支局','鄞州云龙综合支局','鄞州横溪综合支局', '鄞州塘溪综合支局','鄞州瞻岐综合支局','鄞州东吴综合支局','鄞州咸祥综合支局','合计') order by decode(l9.TYPENAME,'鄞州潘火公众支局',0,'鄞州潘火政企支局',1,'鄞州钟公庙综合支局',2,'鄞州长丰综合支局',3,'鄞州新城综合支局',4,'鄞州首南综合支局',5,'鄞州南商政企支局',6, '鄞州东郊综合支局',7,'鄞州下应综合支局',8,'鄞州中河城东综合支局',9,'鄞州东柳综合支局',10,'鄞州福明综合支局',11,'鄞州中河城西综合支局',12,'鄞州明楼综合支局',13,'鄞州白鹤综合支局',14, '鄞州东胜综合支局',15,'鄞州百丈综合支局',16,'鄞州姜山综合支局',17,'鄞州东钱湖综合支局',18,'鄞州邱隘综合支局',19,'鄞州五乡综合支局',20,'鄞州云龙综合支局',21,'鄞州横溪综合支局',22, '鄞州塘溪综合支局',23,'鄞州瞻岐综合支局',24,'鄞州东吴综合支局',25,'鄞州咸祥综合支局',26,'合计',27)

select l9.TYPENAME Zj_Name,L9.CDRY_CDMA_TARGET,L9.CDRY_BB_TARGET,L9.CDRY_GT_TARGET,L9.CDRY_ZD_TARGET, nvl(l8.bbNew,0) bbNew,nvl(l8.cdmaNew,0)cdmaNew,nvl(l8.gtNew,0)gtNew,nvl(l8.itvNew,0)itvNew,nvl(l8.rhNew,0)rhNew,nvl(l8.zdNew,0)zdNew from (select * from (select Zj_Name,nvl(cdmaNew,0)cdmaNew,nvl(bbNew,0)bbNew,nvl(rhNew,0)rhNew,nvl(gtNew,0)gtNew,nvl(itvNew,0)itvNew,nvl(zdNew,0)zdNew from (select P1.ZJ_LEAD_NAME as Zj_Name,nvl(p1.cdmaNew,0) as cdmaNew,nvl(p1.bbNew,0) as bbNew,nvl(p1.rhNew,0) as rhNew,nvl(p1.gtNew,0) as gtNew,nvl(p1.itvNew,0) as itvNew from (select C.ZJ_LEAD_NAME,SUM(MSU_NEW_CDMA_CNT)AS cdmaNew,SUM(MSU_NEW_LAN_CNT)AS bbNew,SUM(MSU_MIX_CNT)AS rhNew,SUM(MSU_MIX_169_CNT)AS gtNew,SUM(MSU_NEW_ITV_CNT)AS itvNew from XFY_RPT_IO_DAY a1 left join XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY B ON A1.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=B.MKT_NAME left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_PAR C on B.ZJ=C.ZJ_ABBR_NAME WHERE A1.APPLY_DT>= #{startDate} AND A1.APPLY_DT<= #{endDate} group by C.ZJ_LEAD_NAME )p1) l1 left join ( select C.ZJ_LEAD_NAME ,nvl(count(*),0) AS zdNew from XFY_RPT_PROM_LST_IO_DAY_D a2 left join XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY B ON A2.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=B.MKT_NAME left join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_PAR C on B.ZJ=C.ZJ_ABBR_NAME WHERE a2.APPLY_DT>= #{startDate} AND a2.APPLY_DT<= #{endDate} and a2.OFFER_NAME in ( '202010话费权益40元/月（24月）','202012话费权益50元/月（24月）','202002套餐减免30元/月（24月）','202003副卡终端购机包19元/月（24月）', '202003副卡终端购机包29元/月（24月）','202106零首付1200元分期月付50元（24月）' ) group by C.ZJ_LEAD_NAME ) l2 on l1.Zj_Name=l2.ZJ_LEAD_NAME) ) l8 left join XFY_REP_ZSS_TARGET L9 ON L8.Zj_Name=L9.TYPENAME where l8.Zj_Name in ('黄红','鲁建盛','毛高松','邬云峰','陆黎达','郑培坚') order by decode(l9.TYPENAME,'黄红',0,'鲁建盛',1,'毛高松',2,'邬云峰',3,'陆黎达',4,'郑培坚',5)
select max(a.ORDER_ITEM_ACCEPT_DATE) MAX_ZSS_DT FROM XFY_RPT_IO_DAY a
